title: Article’s Designer-Favorite Furniture Is Up to Half Off — Shop the Top 10 Fall Clearance Finds
summary: Save up to 50 percent on sofas, sectionals, dining tables and plenty more modern and midcentury modern staples.

title: Monos Makes Moves to Los Angeles With First West Coast Location on Abbot Kinney Boulevard
summary: The Venice, Calif. location opened doors on Friday following a VIP sneak peek: “Los Angeles embodies so much of what Monos stands for — creativity, cultural diversity and a deep connection to global travel.”
